product.longDescription: Sturdy, upright plants produce high yields of uniform, 5" smooth, mostly two-lobed fruits. Bastan's fruits may be used at the green unripe or brown ripe stages. Excellent fried, roasted, or in chile rellenos. Avg. 5,600 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.

value: Early and adaptable poblano, easy to peel for chile rellenos.

Bastan (F1) Poblano Pepper Seed

Product ID:3274.113274

Sturdy, upright plants produce high yields of uniform, 5" smooth, mostly two-lobed fruits. Bastan's fruits may be used at the green unripe or brown ripe stages. Excellent fried, roasted, or in chile rellenos. Avg. 5,600 seeds/oz. Packet: 25 seeds.
